lines.text: Maybe it was a sort of... bullfighter situation.
Like, he took a sticker, and then just... held it up where his chest was, right?
And then because there was a fire going on, ash and smoke, and Slick couldn't see too well...
He shot for the sticker instead of the wizard, who moved out of the way!
That's a heck of a tricky move you're assumin' he pulled.
More importantly- have we been over this? That gunshot happened well before the blaze tripped the fire alarm.
So the fire wouldn't be impactin' his aim.
